name: Rogueless Freelancer
description: Please hover your mouse on the options for details, Some changes will only apply when a new campaign starts.

options.name: Levelup Anytime
options.tooltip: You can advance your prestige level when the guns are not fully collected, but if you already collect them all you can't level up sorry. Get rid of one of them in mission lmao

options.name: Marked Leader
options.tooltip: When in a showdown level, only the real target is marked in instinct

options.name: Easy Merces
options.tooltip: You earn free 114,514 merces everytime you check the stocks. Reach mastery 16 first if you don't know what it is. Get your free initial merces in the infirmary if you're completely broke.

options.name: Persistent Items
options.tooltip: If you fail or abort the current campaign or switch to hardcore mode, you can still keep your freelancer items. However, leaving them in missions or advancing prestige levels still cause intended item removal

options.name: Saved Progression
options.tooltip: Your campaign progression won't be reset if you failed. The only way to reset is to manually abort or complete

options.name: Single Territory
options.tooltip: For each campaign, you only need to clear one single territory, which is the final showdown

options.name: Full Territories
options.tooltip: For each campaign, you need to clear 19 territories, which are all available maps for Freelancer

options.name: Zero Alerted Territories
options.tooltip: No territories are alerted when a campaign starts.

options.name: Regular Alerted Territories
options.tooltip: The number of alerted territories in hardcore mode has been reduced to the same level as regular mode.

options.name: Full Alerted Territories
options.tooltip: All territories are alerted when a campaign start

options.name: Never Alert Territories
options.tooltip: Failing an unalerted territory won't alert any other territories

options.name: Full Safes
options.tooltip: Spawn as many merces safes as possible.

options.name: Full Crates
options.tooltip: Spawn as many supply crates as possible.

options.name: Full Suppliers
options.tooltip: Spawn as many suppliers as possible.

options.name: Single Target
options.tooltip: There'll only be one target in the territory takedown missions

options.name: Full Targets
options.tooltip: There'll be five targets in the territory takedown missions
